sentences.en: But with the advent of fetal cell research, the practice has reached a whole new level.
sentences.cn: 但是,随着胎细胞研究的到来, 实际应用已达到了全新的水平.

sentences.en: Deptford had come alive with the advent of the new priest at St Paul's.
sentences.cn: 圣保罗教堂新牧师的到来使德特福德变得生机勃勃。

sentences.en: I awaited Christmas Eve, and the always exciting advent of fat Santa.
sentences.cn: 我等待着圣诞前夜，以及圣诞胖爷爷那总是令人兴奋的到来。

sentences.en: Quills were the chief writing implement from the 6 th century AD until the advent of steel pens in the mid 19 th century.
sentences.cn: 从公元6世纪到19世纪中期钢笔出现以前,羽毛笔是主要的书写工具.

sentences.en: Since the advent of atomic power, there have been great changes in industry.
sentences.cn: 自从原子能问世以来, 工业领域起了很大变化.

sentences.en: Since the advent of Emilia, his mind was never quiet.
sentences.cn: 同埃米莉亚交往以后, 他的心境从此安静不下来了.

sentences.en: Swallows come by group at the advent of spring.
sentences.cn: 春天来临时燕子成群飞来。

sentences.en: Swallows come by groups at the advent of spring.
sentences.cn: 春天来临时燕子成群飞来.

sentences.en: The advent of aircraft brought with it aeronautical engineering.
sentences.cn: 宇宙飞船的问世导致了航天工程的出现.

sentences.en: The advent of the computer changed people's life greatly.
sentences.cn: 计算机的出现极大地改变了人们的生活。

sentences.en: The advent of the computer has brought this sort of task within the bounds of possibility.
sentences.cn: 电脑的出现使这种任务的完成成为可能。

sentences.en: The advent of the Euro will redefine Europe.
sentences.cn: 欧元的出现将重新定义欧洲.

sentences.en: The advent of war led to a greater austerity.
sentences.cn: 战争的到来使形势更为严峻。

sentences.en: The object's advent is the significance's verification.
sentences.cn: 该客体的出现是其意义的证实.

sentences.en: With the advent of the magazine Chueh - hui's life became more interesting and active.
sentences.cn: 周报创刊以后觉慧的生活有了一些改变.

phrases.tran_cn: (重要人物或事件)…的出现(或到来)

trans.tran_en: the time when something first begins to be widely used
